entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Snow beginning after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 9.
